7265.title: TunnelBear provides information about how they collect personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they collect personal data
tosdr.tldr: TunnelBear defines "personal data" as "any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ("Individual") and includes information provided by you while using our Services". They also consider personal data combined with non-personal data to be personal data. They provide information on how they collect "account user data", "operational data",  and "personal and financial data collected at payment".  However, they do not explicitly state how they collect "cookies and persistent trackers".

7266.title: TunnelBear provides information about how they intend to use your personal data

tosdr.case: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
tosdr.tldr: TunnelBear defines "personal data" as "any information relating to an identified or identifiable natural person ("Individual") and includes information provided by you while using our Services". They also consider personal data combined with non-personal data to be personal data. They provide information on how they use "account user data", "operational data", "personal and financial data collected at payment", and "cookies and persistent trackers".
